com.comphenix.xp.parser.sections

Class SectionParser<TOutput>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comphenix.xp.parser.ConfigurationParser<TOutput>
      • com.comphenix.xp.parser.sections.SectionParser<TOutput>
  • Type Parameters:
    TOutput - - output type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ItemsSectionParser, LevelsSectionParser, MobSectionParser, PlayerSectionParser

    public abstract class SectionParser<TOutput>
extends ConfigurationParser<TOutput>
    Represents a section parser. It is similar to a configuration parser, but has different semantics when it comes to handling errors.
    Author:
    Kristian

    • Method Detail

      • isCollectExceptions

        public boolean isCollectExceptions()
        Retrieves whether or not to push exceptions from individual parse lines, and print it to the assigned debugger instead of throwing them at once.
        Returns:
        TRUE to do wait until the end, FALSE to throw a ParsingException immediately.

      • getDebugger

        public Debugger getDebugger()
        Retrieves the current debugger.
        Returns:
        Current debugger.

      • setDebugger

        public void setDebugger(Debugger debugger)
        Sets the debugger that will handle parse exceptions along the way. By setting this to a non-null value, the parse semantics changes - now, a single parsing exception will simply be printed to the debugger, and the operation will continue.
        Parameters:
        debugger - - new debugger to attach.
